scripts.watch-build-css: nodemon --watch ./src --ext css --exec 'bun run src/_build/build_CSS.js && bun build ./src/index.js --outdir ./dist'
scripts.watch-build-js: nodemon --watch ./src --ext js --exec 'bun run src/_build/build_JS.js && bun build ./src/index.js --outdir ./dist'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf dist_feather_icons && rm -rf dist_js && rm -rf dist_styles
scripts.dist-all: bun run clean && bun run build-inject-feather-icons && bun run build-inject-css && bun run build-inject-js && bun run dist
scripts.dist-all-minify: bun run clean && bun run build-inject-feather-icons && bun run build-inject-css-minify && bun run build-inject-js-minify && bun run dist-minify
